title: Critics Take Hakeem Jeffries to Task For Praising Trump's Latest Pardon
description: Many blasted the House minority leader's reaction to Trump pardoning a Democrat who was indicted on charges of bribery and acting as a foreign agent.
content: House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries (D-N.Y.) on Wednesday praised President Donald Trumps decision to preemptively pardon Rep. Henry Cuellar (D-Texas), a conservative Democrat who was indicted on c… [+2305 chars]
